title: OpenAI Cribbed Our Tax Example, But Can GPT-4 Really Do Tax?. (arXiv:2309.09992v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: The authors explain where OpenAI got the tax law example in its livestream demonstration of GPT-4, why GPT-4 got the wrong answer, and how it fails to reliably calculate taxes.
context:
Title: OpenAI Cribbed Our Tax Example, But Can GPT-4 Really Do Tax?. (arXiv:2309.09992v1 [cs.AI])
Abstract: The authors explain where OpenAI got the tax law example in its livestream demonstration of GPT-4, why GPT-4 got the wrong answer, and how it fails to reliably calculate taxes.
translated_title: OpenAI抄袭了我们的税务案例，但GPT-4真的能够处理税务吗？
translated_abstract: 作者解释了OpenAI在GPT-4的直播演示中使用税法案例的来源，以及为什么GPT-4得到了错误的答案，以及它如何无法可靠地计算税务。
tldr: GPT-4在处理税务方面存在问题，无法可靠地计算税务。
en_tdlr: GPT-4 has issues in handling taxes and cannot reliably calculate them.
